summary: Ok opinion time  When TABINOF comes out next month will the fans who read it please not harass Dan and Phil for(probably) not...
body:
Ok opinion time When TABINOF comes out next month will the fans who read it please not harass Dan and Phil for(probably) not coming out in it. I know some of the fans are expecting that so please don’t post to their cites and give them grief about trying to do something nice for us. Also if you are fortunate enough to go on their tour… Don’t ask them about phan or mention it. This is a big point in their lives and they deserve to be happy. Idk about you guys but I remember how they were in 2012 and I don’t want to go back to that. So my point is just please support them and give them all the love they deserve for bringing us such an amazing(😉) book. Thanks


Wow so I was just going through my drafts and found this. Crazy how so much has changed since then. Two world tours… I can’t wait to see what the next chapter is like

Idk about you guys but I remember how they were in 2012 and I don’t want to go back to that. summary:
Okey, I’m gonna say it, you can come at me, I’ll be ready (hopefully) but Phil didn’t deserve to win
That’s right, I have an...
body:
Okey, I’m gonna say it, you can come at me, I’ll be ready (hopefully) but Phil didn’t deserve to win

That’s right, I have an opinion that’s different from everyone else’s

and it’s true that I lean towards Dan in preference so my opinion might be biased

But like, every all or nothing that Phil won unfairly? I can’t deal with it

And I know it’s a silly game and it doesn’t really matters who wins, and that Dan doesn’t really care, but I do, I care, and I can’t believe this

I’m probably gonna be mad about this forever

I’m probably gonna be mad about this forever

summary: The Dan vs. Phil finale made me so happy. They had so much fun, they were all giggly and cute and seemed to genuinely have...
body:
The Dan vs. Phil finale made me so happy. They had so much fun, they were all giggly and cute and seemed to genuinely have enjoyed every moment of the series.

I love them so much. I hope they continue being this happy with their amazing work.

reblog.comment:
The Dan vs. Phil finale made me so happy. They had so much fun, they were all giggly and cute and seemed to genuinely have enjoyed every moment of the series.

I love them so much. I hope they continue being this happy with their amazing work.
